statement.p: A certain bread recipe asks you to combine flour and yeast with 1 cups of warm 115 째F water. If the water is hotter or colder than that, then the bread won't rise.
All you have available are hot tap water that is 140 째F and cold tap water that is 60 째F.
How much hot tap water and cold tap water should you mix together to get 1 cups of 115 째F water?

p.em: Round your answers to 2 decimal places.
